title: sam2014
author: sam2014
content: Please can one recommend a trusted person for escrow service

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Check out  Hhampuz   Management and escrow service, he is trusted and respected community member and always active.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: sam2014 on July 31, 2023, 06:41:26 PMPlease can one recommend a trusted person for escrow service Obviously you will get many reputated escrow providers in this forum. I am sharing with you a detailed list about them. Recommended bitcointalk escrow servicesTo know more details about escrow providers and their services you can check this thread: ₿ LIST ₿ Bitcointalk's ESCROW providers: Ranking & Blacklist ☠ Avoid Scam ☠You can choose any of them and to find out if they are active on not you just check their Last Active time. You you want to know about my recommendation I will say everyone is trusted and punctual but obviously  Hhampuz  has a great reputation.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: sam2014 on July 31, 2023, 06:41:26 PMPlease can one recommend a trusted person for escrow service For how much? If it is for 5k or less then I can hold the fund as escrow. If more than you can use any escrow from this list (Few Trusted Escrow Providers). Quote from: Nwada001 on July 31, 2023, 06:45:46 PMCheck out  Hhampuz   Management and escrow service, he is trusted and respected community member and always active.Probably you do not know that Hhampuz stepped escrow service. If you have any questions you may pm to Hhampuz.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Try to use the @GazetaBitcoin escrow service, I see the conversation in ANN is not free of charge, of course you have to ask first.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on July 31, 2023, 06:51:08 PMProbably you do not know that Hhampuz stepped escrow service. If you have any questions you may pm to Hhampuz.Indeed, I did not know about that. Thanks for the update. I will have to update that on my list now as the user is one of the only escrows I have come in contact with with their service history and on its trust page, although some of the escrow review feedback was from 20220.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: sam2014 on July 31, 2023, 07:48:43 PMIt's less down for now just about 90 dollars As it is only a few dollars I am able to handle the escrow service. Please tell me the details of the escrow. Purpose of the escrow, terms of you and the other party, and who will send the fund to escrow and who will send the fund directly to the other party, or both of you will send the fund to the escrow.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: sam2014 on July 31, 2023, 06:41:26 PMPlease can one recommend a trusted person for escrow service I will recommend irfan_pak10 buy sell telegram group @bptrades. I made deal more than 500$ three times smoothly without any fee. you can also try. Albon is the man who escow fund and work as a middle man there and process deal.

Please tell me the details of the escrow. comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: sam2014 on August 02, 2023, 06:17:34 AMQuote from: shasan on July 31, 2023, 07:56:12 PMQuote from: sam2014 on July 31, 2023, 07:48:43 PMIt's less down for now just about 90 dollars As it is only a few dollars I am able to handle the escrow service. Please tell me the details of the escrow. Purpose of the escrow, terms of you and the other party, and who will send the fund to escrow and who will send the fund directly to the other party, or both of you will send the fund to the escrow.I am buying a blog from Klipp321, he said the blog has verified AdSense account that's why I need escrow to deal so I could make sure all this is in place, @shasan would be our escrow value is $90It is nice you opted for shasan. He got a good reputation here and as such is reliable and trustworthy to handle your escrow services. Be rest assured that he will deliver with all form of sincerity and transparency.He has other services running here for years which has been successful with recommendations for members here who have subscribed to his services. You would definitely have something positive to say after engaging on his services.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: sam2014 on August 02, 2023, 06:17:34 AMI am buying a blog from Klipp321, he said the blog has verified AdSense account that's why I need escrow to deal so I could make sure all this is in place, @shasan would be our escrow value is $90Thanks for the information you have provided. Would you like to inform the seller to post on the thread about the agreement of you? Once both of you agree with your terms I will post my USDT wallet to accept the escrow fund. If everything goes well then I will release the fund to the seller.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Litzki1990 on August 24, 2023, 03:04:37 PMFew Trusted Escrow Providers username and ANN thread links are given below.1. minerjones           ANN2. GazetaBitcoin          ANN3. OgNasty             ANNWhere you were on these days this suggestion was provided more than 20 days ago and there has been no discussion on this topic for more than 20 days. So, I could not find any reason for bumping the thread. The post was for an escrow for a transaction. DO you think any transaction may wait for escrow for about a month?
